definition: to be utterly defeated/to be routed
to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither

sentences.english: That defeat proved to be Spain’s only loss of the tournament.
sentences.chinese: 這次敗北是西班牙此次世界盃摘冠之旅唯一敗績。

sentences.english: And he hasn't lost since Erik Morales outpointed him in 2005.
sentences.chinese: 自2005年點數輸給莫拉雷斯以來，至今無敗績。

sentences.english: The morale of the football team was very low after its defeat.
sentences.chinese: 遭受敗績之後，那支足球隊士氣相當低落。

sentences.english: We hope Michael Chang is soon on the rebound from a losing streak.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望張德培很快從一連敗績的陰影中走出來。

sentences.english: He had been made the scapegoat for all the failures of the Luftwaffe.
sentences.chinese: 他就是德國空軍各次敗績的替罪羊。
